author: Jilayne

review: So far it's everything I expected. I'm no stranger to TV apps, been a Visio television owner for several years. The experience on Fire TV is definitely far improved and the voice search is what TV apps have been missing for years.Paired with Amazon Prime and Sling TV, there is no shortage of things to watch, but add in all of the other apps available and games this thing should keep us occupied for some time. Definitely worth the early termination charge to cancel my satellite service, plus I'll save over $700 net this year.

author: Mark A Scott

review: My husband got these on his account.  First mistake. Amazon needs to really step up their Customer service game if they want to be a content provider. If the physical ip address is at the same location, I should be able to access my account too. Netflix doesn't find this that hard to do.  So what's up Amazon? Link the accounts? Sheesh.For the most part we've been happy with the use of it.  However one of the mainstays Hulu is starting to really give us grief.  Though with some trouble shooting we determined it wasn't Hulu itself that was the problem. We have it also on our xbox and it works fine there.  It's hiccuped several times and then kicked us out, making us watch the same ad 3 x without even the gratification of a show.  If Amazon doesn't start developing better communication, they are only going to be a shipping house and not a content provider.

review: It's a great product, and so far, we're pretty impressed with it.I would have given this 5 stars, but I think Amazon.com fails on this.  The day after I purchased it, Amazon puts it on sale for $15.00 off.  I think, after all these years of being a good customer of Amazon.com, and a Prime customer since Prime began, that I would have gotten a courtesy notice that the item was going on sale, and give me the choice to wait a day or two to order before handing over the full purchase price.

review: Love Amazon fire TV. I like it because my Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon accounts are all located in one central location.
